newsitem.title: USA: XcelleNet, U.S. Robotics in marketing deal.
newsitem.headline: XcelleNet, U.S. Robotics in marketing deal.

text.p: XcelleNet Inc said on Tuesday it joined a marketing and distribution program U.S. Robotics Corp maintains for independent software vendors whose products can be used with Robotics' EdgeServer remote access server.
Under this arrangement, a free, limited-use version of XcelleNet's SessionXpress Basic product will be marketed with each EdgeServer product, XcelleNet said.
XcelleNet will receive no revenue through this arrangement, but will market upgrades to users who receive the product.
SessionXpress Basic is designed to allow system administrators to automate content updates and manage remote hard drives, individual files and directories for all remote intranet users.
XcelleNet was trading at 18 on Tuesday, up 1/4 on the day.
